resources:
GitLegit
Once upon a time…. John Doe was sick of all the gambling, sleeping day’s and walking nights in Last Vegas. Tired of everything… he just wants to be like everyone else. A good job, full LinkedIn Profile, Very Active on Facebook. But the most important thing is finding a job! Hello, my name is John I’m 32 years old. I’m at this point.Looking for a job. My Friends told me that getLinked is a good way to start searching for work. Unfortunately, I don’t have any personal computer. Let’s go to the Internet Cafe. I need to go to the Internet Café in the neighborhood. CLEANERS WANTED!! We are a large company looking for cleaners to clean stuff!\n The pay is very high, you will be nicely compensated, interested? then please apply! Looking for volunteers, (Minimum wage) We are a small non-profit organization and we are looking for volunteerd to help us build several houses for the poor. We are in desperate need of help so you will be receiving minimum wage pay If you are interested, please apply below!
Once upon a time John Doe depleted all his food while binge watching every marvil series on netflex. But John Doe can’t enjoy his movies without food. Help John Doe with his groceries. > Goodevening Sir, Welcome to …[choice]... We have a great deal for today. Are you interested? “ > First you need to fill this form on our Ipad and we will print the card for you. It will only take 2 minutes of your time.”> > >
